verses.verse: A good <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H2896>precious<s%> <S%H8081>ointment<s%>; and the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4194>death<s%> than the <S%H3117>day<s%> of one's <S%H3205>birth<s%>.

It is <S%H2896>better<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H60>mourning<s%>, than to <S%H3212>go<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4960>feasting<s%>: <S%H834>for<s%> that is the <S%H5490>end<s%> of all <S%H120>men<s%>; and the <S%H2416>living<s%> will <S%H5414>lay<s%> it to his <S%H3820>heart<s%>.

<S%H3708>Sorrow<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than <S%H7814>laughter<s%>: for by the <S%H7455>sadness<s%> of the <S%H6440>countenance<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> is made <S%H3190>better<s%>. Sorrow: or, Anger

The <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> is in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H60>mourning<s%>; but the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%> is in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H8057>mirth<s%>.
It is <S%H2896>better<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1606>rebuke<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%>, than for a <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H7892>song<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%>.
For as the <S%H6963>crackling<s%> of <S%H5518>thorns<s%> under a <S%H5518>pot<s%>, so is the <S%H7814>laughter<s%> of the <S%H3684>fool<s%>: this also is <S%H1892>vanity<s%>. crackling: Heb. sound
Surely <S%H6233>oppression<s%> maketh a wise <S%H2450>man<s%> <S%H1984>mad<s%>; and a <S%H4979>gift<s%> <S%H6>destroyeth<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%>.

<S%H2896>Better<s%> is the <S%H319>end<s%> of a <S%H1697>thing<s%> than the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> thereof: and the <S%H750>patient<s%> in <S%H7307>spirit<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than the <S%H1362>proud<s%> in <S%H7307>spirit<s%>.
Be not <S%H926>hasty<s%> in thy <S%H7307>spirit<s%> to be <S%H3707>angry<s%>: for <S%H3708>anger<s%> <S%H5117>resteth<s%> in the <S%H2436>bosom<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%>.

<S%H559>Say<s%> not thou, What is the cause that the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> were <S%H2896>better<s%> than these? for thou dost not <S%H7592>enquire<s%> <S%H2451>wisely<s%> concerning this. wisely: Heb. out of wisdom

<S%H2451>Wisdom<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> with an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>: and by it there is <S%H3148>profit<s%> to them that <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%>. good: or, as good as an inheritance, yea, better too

For <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is a <S%H6738>defence<s%>, and <S%H3701>money<s%> is a <S%H6738>defence<s%>: but the <S%H3504>excellency<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> is, that <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> giveth <S%H2421>life<s%> to them that <S%H1167>have<s%> it. defence: Heb. shadow
<S%H7200>Consider<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>: for who <S%H3201>can<s%> make that <S%H8626>straight<s%>, which he hath made <S%H5791>crooked<s%>?

In the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2896>prosperity<s%> be <S%H2896>joyful<s%>, but in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7451>adversity<s%> <S%H7200>consider<s%>: <S%H430>God<s%> also hath <S%H6213>set<s%> the one over <S%H5980>against<s%> the other, to the <S%H1700>end<s%> that <S%H120>man<s%> should <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H3972>nothing<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him. set: Heb. made

All things have I <S%H7200>seen<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of my <S%H1892>vanity<s%>: there <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H6662>just<s%> man that <S%H6>perisheth<s%> in his <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, and there is a <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man that <S%H748>prolongeth<s%> his life in his <S%H7451>wickedness<s%>.
Be not <S%H6662>righteous<s%> over <S%H7235>much<s%>; neither make thyself <S%H3148>over<s%> <S%H2449>wise<s%>: why shouldest thou <S%H8074>destroy<s%> thyself? destroy: Heb. be desolate?
Be not over <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H7561>wicked<s%>, neither be thou <S%H5530>foolish<s%>: why shouldest thou <S%H4191>die<s%> before thy <S%H6256>time<s%>? before: Heb. not in thy time?

It is <S%H2896>good<s%> that thou shouldest take <S%H270>hold<s%> of this; yea, also from <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3240>withdraw<s%> not thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>: for he that <S%H3373>feareth<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> shall come <S%H3318>forth<s%> of them all.
<S%H2451>Wisdom<s%> <S%H5810>strengtheneth<s%> the <S%H2450>wise<s%> more than <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H7989>mighty<s%> men which are in the <S%H5892>city<s%>.
For there is not a <S%H6662>just<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> upon <S%H776>earth<s%>, that <S%H6213>doeth<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%>, and <S%H2398>sinneth<s%> not.

Also <S%H5414>take<s%> no <S%H3820>heed<s%> unto all <S%H1697>words<s%> that are <S%H1696>spoken<s%>; lest thou <S%H8085>hear<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H7043>curse<s%> thee: take: Heb. give not thine heart
For <S%H6471>oftentimes<s%> <S%H7227><s%> also thine own <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> that thou thyself likewise hast <S%H7043>cursed<s%> <S%H312>others<s%>.
All <S%H2090>this<s%> have I <S%H5254>proved<s%> by <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>: I <S%H559>said<s%>, I will be <S%H2449>wise<s%>; but it was <S%H7350>far<s%> from me.
That which is far <S%H7350>off<s%>, and exceeding <S%H6013>deep<s%>, who can find it <S%H4672>out<s%>?

I <S%H5437>applied<s%> mine <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%>, and to <S%H8446>search<s%>, and to seek <S%H1245>out<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, and the <S%H2808>reason<s%> of things, and to <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> of <S%H3689>folly<s%>, even of <S%H5531>foolishness<s%> and <S%H1947>madness<s%>: I applied: Heb. I and mine heart compassed

And I <S%H4672>find<s%> more <S%H4751>bitter<s%> than <S%H4194>death<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%>, whose <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H4685>snares<s%> and <S%H2764>nets<s%>, and her <S%H3027>hands<s%> as <S%H612>bands<s%>: whoso <S%H2896>pleaseth<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H4422>escape<s%> from her; but the <S%H2398>sinner<s%> shall be <S%H3920>taken<s%> by her. whoso: Heb. he that is good before God

<S%H7200>Behold<s%>, this have I <S%H4672>found<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H6953>preacher<s%>, counting <S%H259>one<s%> by <S%H259>one<s%>, to find <S%H4672>out<s%> the <S%H2808>account<s%>: counting: or, weighing one thing after another, to find out the reason

Which yet my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1245>seeketh<s%>, but I <S%H4672>find<s%> not: <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> among a <S%H505>thousand<s%> have I <S%H4672>found<s%>; but a <S%H802>woman<s%> among all those have I not <S%H4672>found<s%>.

<S%H7200>Lo<s%>, this <S%H905>only<s%> have I <S%H4672>found<s%>, that <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H3477>upright<s%>; but they have sought <S%H1245>out<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H2810>inventions<s%>.
